system:
note description: "EiffelVision2 toolbar, implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_i.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_IMP undefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_i.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_set_parent_impset_parent_imp end
../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_IMP [../interface/ev_tool_bar_item.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_ITEM] undefine ../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xml#f_item_by_dataitem_by_data redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_pnd_deferred_item_parent.xmlEV_PND_DEFERRED_ITEM_PARENT
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_needs_event_box../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does a_widget need an event box? do Result := True end
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create the tool-bar. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. local a_cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_newgtk_toolbar_new) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_IMP} a_cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (once "v2toolbar") {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_set_namegtk_widget_set_name (../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_set_show_arrowgtk_toolbar_set_show_arrow (../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, False) ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style := True ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_disable_verticaldisable_vertical end
f_list_widget../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget: FalsePOINTER do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget end
f_set_parent_imp../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_set_parent_impset_parent_imp (a_container_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp to a_container_imp. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_set_parent_impPrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_primitive_imp.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_IMP} (a_container_imp) ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_update_toolbar_styleupdate_toolbar_style end
feature -- Status report
f_has_vertical_button_style../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is the pixmap displayed vertically above text for -- all buttons contained in Current? If False, then -- the pixmap is displayed to left of text.
f_is_vertical../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_is_verticalis_vertical: FalseBOOLEAN -- Are the buttons in Current arranged vertically?
feature -- Status setting
f_enable_vertical_button_style../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_enable_vertical_button_styleenable_vertical_button_style -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style is True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style := True ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_update_toolbar_styleupdate_toolbar_style end
f_disable_vertical_button_style../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_disable_vertical_button_styledisable_vertical_button_style -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style is False. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style := False ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_update_toolbar_styleupdate_toolbar_style end
f_enable_vertical../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_enable_verticalenable_vertical -- Enable vertical toolbar style. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_is_verticalis_vertical := True {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_set_orientationgtk_toolbar_set_orientation (../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, 1) end
f_disable_vertical../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_disable_verticaldisable_vertical -- Disable vertical toolbar style (ie: Horizontal). do ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_is_verticalis_vertical := False {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_set_orientationgtk_toolbar_set_orientation (../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, 0) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_I} -- Implementation
f_block_selection_for_docking../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_block_selection_for_dockingblock_selection_for_docking do end
feature -- Implementation
f_item_from_coords../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_item_from_coordsitem_from_coords (a_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32): detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pnd_deferred_item.xmlEV_PND_DEFERRED_ITEM -- Return toolbar item corresponding to coordinates (a_x, a_y). local i: FalseINTEGER_32 l_width: FalseINTEGER_32 l_item_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP do from i := 1 until i > ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_countcount or else Result /= Void loop l_item_imp ?= (../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array @ i).../interface/ev_item.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_item_imp /= Void end if l_item_imp /= Void then l_width := l_width + l_item_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_widget_imp.xml#f_widthwidth end if a_x < l_width then Result ?= l_item_imp end i := i + 1 end end
f_update_toolbar_style../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_update_toolbar_styleupdate_toolbar_style -- Set the style of Current relative to items local tbb_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON_IMP has_text, has_pixmap: FalseBOOLEAN i, a_style: FalseINTEGER_32 do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp /= Void then from i := 1 until i > ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_countcount loop tbb_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_i_thi_th (i).../interface/ev_item.xml#f_implementationimplementation if tbb_imp /= Void and then not tbb_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_button_imp.xml#f_texttext.Falseis_empty then has_text := True end if tbb_imp /= Void and then tbb_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap /= Void then has_pixmap := True end i := i + 1 end if has_text and has_pixmap then if ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_has_vertical_button_stylehas_vertical_button_style then a_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_both_enumgtk_toolbar_both_enum else a_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_both_horiz_enumgtk_toolbar_both_horiz_enum end elseif has_text then a_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_text_enumgtk_toolbar_text_enum else a_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_icons_enumgtk_toolbar_icons_enum end {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_set_stylegtk_toolbar_set_style (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, a_style) end end
f_insertion_position../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_insertion_positioninsertion_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Result is index - 1 of item beneath the -- current mouse pointer or count + 1 if over the toolbar -- and not over a button. local wid_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_widget_imp.xmlEV_GTK_WIDGET_IMP tbi: detachable ../interface/ev_tool_bar_item.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_ITEM do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_countcount + 1 wid_imp := ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xml#f_gtk_widget_imp_at_pointer_positiongtk_widget_imp_at_pointer_position if wid_imp /= Void then tbi ?= wid_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface if tbi /= Void and ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (tbi) then Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (tbi, 1) - 1 end end end
f_insert_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v: attached like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Insert v at position i. local v_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP r: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP do v_imp ?= v.../interface/ev_item.xml#f_implementationimplementation check v_imp /= Void then end v_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_set_item_parent_impset_item_parent_imp (Current) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_toolbar_insertgtk_toolbar_insert (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, v_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, i - 1) r ?= v_imp if r /= Void then {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_radio_tool_button_set_groupgtk_radio_tool_button_set_group (r.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group) ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group := r.../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group end ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsego_i_th (i) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falseput_left (v) if ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp /= Void then ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_update_toolbar_styleupdate_toolbar_style end end
f_remove_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Remove item at i-th position. local imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP item_ptr: FalsePOINTER r: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP l_radio_group: FalsePOINTER do ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsego_i_th (i) imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsei_th (i).../interface/ev_item.xml#f_implementationimplementation check imp /= Void then end r ?= imp if r /= Void then l_radio_group := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_radio_tool_button_get_groupgtk_radio_tool_button_get_group (r.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) check radio_button_not_null: l_radio_group /= Falsedefault_pointer end if {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_g_slist_lengthg_slist_length (l_radio_group) = 1 then ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group := Falsedefault_pointer end end item_ptr := imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_removegtk_container_remove (../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, item_ptr) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falseremove imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_set_item_parent_impset_item_parent_imp (Void) end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP} -- Implementation
f_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group: FalsePOINTER -- GSList containing the radio peers held within Current
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_tool_bar.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_IMP
